name: Experience API for GamiPress by Grassblade
author: Next Software Solutions

sections.description:
This plugin enables Experience API (xAPI) tracking of Gamification data generated using GamiPress plugin.

There are two key functions of this plugin:

1. Generate xAPI Data for GamiPress:

All the points generated using GamiPress plugin is reported to your Learning Record Store (LRS) via GrassBlade xAPI Companion plugin.

So, technically, if you can generate points for anything via GamiPress you can send its tracking data to your LRS.

2. Award GamiPress points for xAPI Content:

You can generate points for different xAPI Contents supported by GrassBlade xAPI Companion. Possible content you can use are:

  • H5P
  • Articulate Storyline
  • Articulate Rise
  • Articulate Studio
  • Articulate 360
  • Adobe Captivate
  • Lectora Inspire
  • Lectora Publisher
  • Lectora Online
  • iSpring Suite
  • Adapt Authoring Tool
  • iSpring Pro
  • DominKnow Claro
  • and more not listed here

Videos Supported with advanced video tracking:

  • YouTube
  • Vimeo
  • MP4
  • MP3
  • HLS (.m3u8)
  • MPEG Dash (.mpd)
  • Wistia

The GamiPress points can be awards on several criteria like:

  • Completed any xAPI Content
  • Completed a specific xAPI Content
  • Failed any xAPI Content
  • Failed a specific xAPI Content
  • Completed any xAPI Content scoring within a percentage range
  • Completed a specific xAPI Content scoring within a percentage range

3. Generate Achievements Report

Admin users can generate Achievements report to check:
* All Achievements earned All users
* Achievement earned by a All users
* All Achievements earned by a user

GrassBlade xAPI Companion works with:

  • LearnDash LMS
  • WP Courseware LMS
  • LifterLMS
  • LearnPress LMS
  • TutorLMS
  • MasterStudy LMS
  • Sensei LMS
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Please make sure you have installed the other required plugins first as listed on the Details tab.
  2. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/grassblade-xapi-gamipress directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  4. Please follow the documentation of GrassBlade xAPI Companion for reset of the setup,
sections.faq:
What is GrassBlade xAPI Companion plugin?

GrassBlade xAPI Companion is a paid WordPress plugin that enables support for Experience API (xAPI) based content on WordPress.

It also provides best in industry Advanced Video Tracking feature, that works with YouTube, Vimeo and self-hosted MP4 videos. Tracking of MP3 audios is also supported.

It can be used independently without any LMS. However, to add advanced features, it also has integrations with several LMSes.

What is GamiPress Plugin?

GamiPress is a free WordPress plugin which allows you to award your users with digital rewards for interacting with your site.

GamiPress is extremely powerful plugin allowing you to give points, rewards and ranks to your users.
